title: Print2People logo - what font is this?
content:
Hi. Can anybody identify the font used for “Print” and “People”?

Thanks :)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [logo.gif](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=logo_1.gif) | 2.41 KB |
author: tasty_cookie

comments.content: _May well be custom, but a ‘slightly’ modified_ ‘ [Zrnic](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111230425/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/larabie/zrnic/)’_, by Ray Larabie, may get you close.._
Thanks for your try… dont think it’s Zrnic though, and have a feeling it’s not custom. Just a hunch.
